title: Samsung Elec to maintain stake in Samsung Heavy after rights issue
text:
SEOUL (Reuters) - Samsung Electronics Co Ltd ( 005930.KS ) said on Friday it will participate in a rights issue by Samsung Heavy Industries Co Ltd ( 010140.KS ), buying 204 billion won ($192 million) of shares.
The logo of Samsung Electronics is seen at its office building in Seoul, South Korea, March 23, 2018. REUTERS/Kim Hong-Ji Samsung Electronics owned a 16.9 percent stake in Samsung Heavy as of end-2017 and its stake will remain roughly the same, a Samsung Heavy spokesman said.
Samsung Heavy, which has forecast a fourth straight year of operating losses, is planning a new share issuance of about 1.4 trillion won ($1.3 billion).
Reporting by Joyce Lee; Editing by Edwina Gibbs
